Class SimpleItemHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • cofh.lib.inventory.SimpleItemHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraftforge.items.IItemHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ManagedItemHandler, SimpleItemInv

    public class SimpleItemHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements net.minecraftforge.items.IItemHandler
    Simple Item Handler implementation using CoFH Item Storage objects.
